item.title: Pi token saving?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

so i made this minigame, dungeoneering boss killing, with shop and st00f, everytime u kil la different boss, you get bosstokens. code here:

public void handleDungBossDeath(int i) {
	Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];
	c.getPA().movePlayer(2312, 9806, 0);
	c.bossTokens += 7 + Misc.random(7);
}

how would i make it so it saves to the character file, because when u log out and log back in u have 0 left.

Read full topic
